title: Ebola Is Down, But Not Out, In Liberia
teaser: Ten to 12 new cases are reported daily, primarily around the capital and outlying areas. On Monday, Liberia's president announced an initiative, Ebola Must Go, that focuses on getting communities more involved in anti-Ebola measures.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
